descriptions.400:
Neeko tried to understand request, but it makes Neeko confused! Like trying to shapeshift into cloud. Please make request clearer for Neeko!

🎭 Shapeshifting: Confused
descriptions.401:
Neeko needs you to show who you are first! Even Neeko can't pretend to be someone without knowing them. Please log in!

🎭 Shapeshifting: Need Identity
descriptions.402:
This page costs money, and Neeko has no shoma! Neeko is sad tomato now. Maybe find payment method?

🎭 Shapeshifting: Need Shoma
descriptions.403:
This place is forbidden for Neeko! Neeko tried to sneak in as different person but they saw through disguise. Neeko is not allowed here.

🎭 Shapeshifting: Forbidden
descriptions.404:
Neeko tried to be this page, but Neeko is not good enough shapeshifter yet! Neeko is strong tomato, not sad tomato. Maybe try different page?

🎭 Shapeshifting: Failed
descriptions.405:
Neeko used wrong approach! Like trying to swim on land. This method doesn't work here, Neeko needs different way!

🎭 Shapeshifting: Wrong Method
descriptions.406:
Server says 'no' to format Neeko brings! Like Neeko bringing wrong berries to feast. Try different format, yes?

🎭 Shapeshifting: Rejected
descriptions.408:
Neeko waited and waited but nothing happened! Neeko got bored and fell asleep. Request took too long for strong tomato like Neeko!

🎭 Shapeshifting: Timed Out
descriptions.409:
Two things fighting for same spot! Like when Neeko tries to be two people at once. Creates big confusion! Try again maybe?

🎭 Shapeshifting: Conflicted
descriptions.410:
Page is gone forever, like old friend who moved away. Neeko cannot shapeshift into something that doesn't exist anymore. Neeko is sad.

🎭 Shapeshifting: Target Gone
descriptions.413:
Request too big for Neeko to carry! Neeko is strong tomato but not THAT strong. Please make smaller, yes?

🎭 Shapeshifting: Too Heavy
descriptions.429:
Slow down! Neeko can't shapeshift that fast! Too many requests makes Neeko dizzy. Take break, strong tomato needs rest!

🎭 Shapeshifting: Too Fast
descriptions.500:
Oh no! Server is broken and Neeko cannot fix! Neeko tried to shapeshift into working server but failed. Someone else must fix this!

🎭 Shapeshifting: System Error
descriptions.502:
Gateway is acting strange and Neeko is confused! Like trying to talk to someone who speaks weird language. Gateway broken!

🎭 Shapeshifting: Gateway Error
descriptions.503:
Service is taking nap right now. Even Neeko needs rest sometimes! Come back later when service wakes up, yes?

🎭 Shapeshifting: Service Sleeping
descriptions.504:
Gateway is too slow for Neeko! Neeko waited and waited but gateway never responded. Neeko's patience ran out!

🎭 Shapeshifting: Gateway Slow
descriptions.default:
Something went wrong but Neeko doesn't know what!

🎭 Shapeshifting: Unknown
